meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Melissa Hodges Jonathan Marcus Suzanne Vito Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7122.

div.div: Alex Trebek's audio was re-recorded when his voice recovered.

td.p: Melissa Hodges, a part-time mechanical engineer and full-time mom from Allen, Texas
Jonathan Marcus, a law clerk from North Hollywood, California
Suzanne Vito, a writer from Albany, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,500)

tr.td: BOND, JAMES BOND
HISTORY SINCE 1950
DOMAIN EXTENSIONS
"PAY" DAY
YOU MUST REMEMBER THIS
A FISH IS STILL A FISH

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Suzanne
Jonathan
Melissa
LIT BLITZ
PARISH THE THOUGHT, LOUISIANA
PLAY MS. "T" FOR ME
WORLD UNIVERSITIES
ROMAN CIVICS
(Alex: Each correct response two words, five letters in each of them.)
